Project.shortdesc: Shebangs aims to develop a bridge enabling a user authenticated by a trusted Shibboleth IdP to acquire (or delegate) temporary credentials to access resources on the National Grid Service. Our method assumes a user equipped with a standard Web browser. It makes use of a standard MyProxy server, requires no modifications to Shibboleth or Globus middleware, but may necessitate minor modifications to a Web portal such as the NGS portal.
Project.name: SHEBANGS: Shibboleth Enabled Bridge to Access the National Grid Service
